bike.description: ZR 9000 Alloy™ in a long-travel, full-suspension design that quickly adjusts to match the terrain. Lighter than titanium, stronger than steel.

components.description: Fox Talas RLC air spring, rebound/compression damping, lockout, 80/125mm on-the-fly adjustable travel

Bontrager Race Lite Disc Tubeless: Trek/VW Team wheel; One of the lightest disc-specific wheelsets available; Durable and World Class fast; Uses a regular tire/tube, or tubeless tires for increased control and reduced flats; Swiss-made hubs; Race Lite ske
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
